entry.dcterms:title: Stratum Situation and Stratum-Consciousness 1978. Stratification and inequality in four characteristic living areas of Budapest, and the opinion of the residents about this inequality.
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-A19: Stratum Situation and Stratum-Consciousness 1978. Stratification and inequality in four characteristic living areas of Budapest, and the opinion of the residents about this inequality.. data sheet. Version: 2010-09-02

entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-02-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: objective living conditions, values, opinion and orientation concerning living conditions
entry.dcterms:subject: psychology
equality and inequality
labour and employment
family life, marriage, relationship
leisure, tourism and sport
social stratification and groupings
social behaviour and attitudes
social conditions and indicators
housing
demography
person
survey data
cross-section

A sample made up of several different non-representative subsamples. Respondents were interviewed in four characteristic areas of Budapest: in a big industrial plant in Budapest, in the village of Dabas, and among Budapest intellectual groups.
face-to-face interview
A
